children.value: It is said that a poor craftsman blames his tools. I will, therefore, resist the temptation to blame poor website templates for my lack of consistent writing. Nor do I believe that this recent experiment at one more template will spur a fountain of well-formed ideas that manifest themselves as well written posts. One has to keep trying, though.
My motivation has been the latest release of a new version of
. I have been using it as a personal knowledgebase for some time now. Not since I came across

back during my time of using R have I been this excited about creating documents. Having cycled through multiple Jekyll and Pelikan templates over the years, this feels like the closest thing to what I had in the mind for a personal website where I can post from time to time. I like that it supports Jupyter notebooks, which is where I get much of my work done. It is not perfect, but neither am I.
It is with much enthusiasm that I embark on this new journey, or rather a familiar journey in a new terrain. Wish me luck!
